availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Todd (Lyon County, Kentucky, stonemason)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, stonemason. Tennessee native. Married to Susan Kelly Todd in Lyon County, Kentucky, on October 18, 1855. Father of Marion E. Todd and Ann Susan Todd. Stonemason in Eddyville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 764.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film #, p. 47 of 303 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
